# Contributing to Multiplayer Tic Tac Toe

Thank you for your interest in contributing! Here’s how to get started:

## Setup
- Fork this repo and clone your fork locally.
- Install dependencies (see README).
- Make your changes in a new branch (e.g., `feature/new-emoji-support`).

## Code Style
- Follow existing formatting and naming conventions.
- Keep commits atomic and messages clear (“Fix multiplayer desync bug”).

## Pull Requests
- Open a PR to the `main` branch with a clear title/description.
- Describe what the PR changes and why.
- Ensure your code works in at least two browsers and on mobile.
- Reference Issues/roadmap items if relevant.

## Bug Reports & Issues
- Please search existing Issues before submitting new ones.
- Include:
  - Steps to reproduce
  - Expected vs. actual behavior
  - Browser/version and OS
  - Screenshots/logs where possible

## Feature Requests
- Post ideas with reasons, use-case, and possible implementation notes.
- Larger changes: open a Discussion or Issue first for feedback.

## Code of Conduct
- Be respectful and collaborative.
- Keep all communication welcoming and constructive.

Let’s make this the best open-source Tic Tac Toe game possible!
